attributes.action: reintroduce the death penalty for the murder of children and police officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that the death penalty should be reintroduced for child killers, and the killers of police officers. something has to be done to deter murderers

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=death+penalty
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
